SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace

Class Workspace

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.workspace.Workspace
public class Workspace extends Object
Represents a single paint workspace.

A Workspace manages a scrollable view of layered canvases, including base, transparency, effects, and user-added drawing layers. It also tracks file state and zoom controls.

  • Constructor Details

    • Workspace

      public Workspace(String displayName, double width, double height)
      Creates a new workspace with a given name and initial canvas size.
      Parameters:
      displayName - the display name of this workspace
      width - the width of the canvas
      height - the height of the canvas
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if width or height are non-positive

  • Method Details

    • setupDefaultLayers

      private void setupDefaultLayers(double width, double height)
      Initializes the default non-removable layers:
      • Transparency (bottom, mouse-transparent)
      • Base (middle, main drawing surface)
      • Effects (top, mouse-transparent)
      Parameters:
      width - the canvas width
      height - the canvas height

    • createLayer

      private javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas createLayer(String debugName, double width, double height)
      Creates a new canvas layer.
      Parameters:
      debugName - a string identifier (used for debugging/UI inspection)
      width - width of the layer
      height - height of the layer
      Returns:
      the new Canvas

    • addDrawingLayer

      public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas addDrawingLayer()

    • removeLayer

      public void removeLayer(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas layer)
      Removes a drawing layer if it exists and is not a reserved layer.
      Parameters:
      layer - the layer to remove
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if attempting to remove reserved layers

    • isReservedLayer

      private boolean isReservedLayer(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas layer)
      Determines if a given layer is one of the reserved layers.
      Parameters:
      layer - the layer to check
      Returns:
      true if reserved, false otherwise
